title: Umlando Omfishane Wobuciko Esikhaleni - Ithempeli Le-Orbital
heading: Umlando Omfishane Wobuciko Emkhathini
intro: Selokhu kwethulwa ngempumelelo isathelayithi yokwenziwa ngo -1957 , amasathelayithi angaphezu kwezinkulungwane eziyishumi afikile ukuzungeza uMhlaba. Kule nkathi entsha, abaculi bathole indlela yokwandisa umkhuba wabo futhi indawo yangaphandle isiphenduke uhlobo olusha lwekhanvasi. Ngalokho, sekuqubuke imibuzo ebalulekile ngepolitiki yokuhlolwa komkhathi - nakuba kusekuningi okusamele kuhlanganiswe.

leonov.text: Umsebenzi wobuciko wokuqala owadalwa emkhathini kwakuwumdwebo wokuphuma kwelanga phezu koMhlaba, owenziwa usomkhathi waseRussia u-Alexei Leonov ngenkathi egibele iVoskhod 2 ngo -1965 .
leonov.caption: Isiqephu sokuqala sobuciko esidalwe emkhathini, kanye namapensela u-Alexei Leonov ayejwayele ukusidweba. Isithombe: Imnyuziyamu ye-Yuri Gagarin Cosmonaut Training Centre

moonMuseum.paragraph1: Eminyakeni emithathu kamuva, i-Moon Museum , ipuleti elincane le-ceramic okuthiwa lafika eNyangeni elibhalwe ngabaculi abayisithupha abavelele e-US ngaleso sikhathi: Robert Rauschenberg , David Novros , John Chamberlain , Claes Oldenburg , Forrest Myers kanye no-Andy Warhol .
moonMuseum.caption1: Isithombe se-Moon Museum esivela esihlokweni sokuqala se-New York Times. Isithupha sifihla umdwebo kaWarhol.
moonMuseum.paragraph2: Umnikelo ka-Warhol ovusa inkanuko - phezulu kwesokunxele - wenza le phrojekthi yaba inselele kwabezindaba zokuxhumana ngaleso sikhathi.
moonMuseum.caption2: Isithombe i-New York Times ekhethe ukusishicilela, umsebenzi wobuciko obonakala ngezansi kanye nomdwebo ka-Andy Warhol ekhoneni eliphezulu kwesokunxele.

fallenAstronaut.text: Ngo - 1971 , isithombe esincane se- humanoid aluminium esibaziwe esibizwa ngokuthi i-Fallen Astronaut sabekwa eNyangeni ngusonkanyezi we - Apollo 15 uDavid Scott . Umdwebi waseBelgium u-Paul Van Hoeydonck wayehlose, ngalesi siqeshana, ukukhumbula osomkhathi nama-cosmonauts abashone ekuthuthukisweni kokuhlolwa komkhathi.
fallenAstronaut.caption: Ukubuka koqwembe lwesikhumbuzo olushiywe enyangeni endaweni okufikela kuyo i-Hadley-Apennine.

pioneerVoyager.text: Ngawo -1970 , kokubili i- Pioneer Plaques kanye ne -Voyager Probes babeka ama-horizons amasha obuciko emkhathini. Bephethe amaplakhu e-aluminium ane-anodized yegolide anemiyalezo ebonakalayo esuka eMhlabeni iye kunoma iziphi ezinye izihambi zasemkhathini ezingase ziwathole esikhathini esizayo esikude, afanekisela impilo yomuntu ezintweni zakhona ezibaluleke kakhulu.
pioneerVoyager.caption: Ama-Pioneer 10 kanye ne-11 plaque, afakwa endaweni ejulile ngeminyaka yawo-1970.

dove.text: Ngo- 1990 , iBrazil yashiya uphawu lwayo kule ndawo nge -DOVE/OSCAR-17 , isathelayithi eyimfundamakhwela enamandla amakhulu ezinkondlo. Nakuba umqambi wayo engazibheki njengeciko, kwakuwumzamo oyinkondlo ojulile: yaqopha amazwi ezingane ecela ukuthula futhi yawadlulisela kwabayizimfundamakhwela bemisakazo abangaphezu kwezinkulungwane ezimbili emhlabeni wonke, iguqule i-CubeSat ephayona yaba umsebenzi ohlangene womsindo.
dove.caption: I-DOVE/OSCAR-17, isathelayithi eyinkondlo yaseBrazil ehambisa amazwi okuthula ezingane, ngo-1990.

lastPictures.text: Ngo- 2012 , umdwebi u -Trevor Paglen wethula "Izithombe Zokugcina" , i-micro-etched disc equkethe izithombe ezingu-100 ezixhunywe kwisathelayithi yezokuxhumana ye-Echostar XVI ku-geostationary orbit. Idizayinelwe ukuthi ihlale izigidigidi zeminyaka, ihloselwe ukudlula impucuko yabantu njenge-archaeological artifact yesikhathi esizayo esikude.
lastPictures.caption: I-Last Pictures, i-micro-etched disc eyenzelwe ukwedlula isintu, yethulwa ngo-2012.

ulises.text: Ngo- 2015 , i -Colectivo Espacial Mexicano (i-Mexican Space Collective) yethula i-Ulises I , i-nanosatellite eyakhiwe njenge-opera yomqondo ngaphansi kokuqondisa komdwebi u-Juan José Díaz Infante Casasús . Isathelayithi yayiswa ku-stratosphere ngebhaluni ngesikhathi se-Feria del Libro de Guadalajara. Idizayinelwe ukuqhuma cishe amahora amane futhi yehle ngeparachute.
ulises.caption: I-Ulises I, i-opera yomqondo yesethelayithi ka-Colectivo Espacial Mexicano.

artsat.text: Kwaze kwafika ngo-2014 lapho kwethulwa khona isethelayithi yokuqala yobuciko. Iphrojekthi ye-University of Tokyo's ARTSAT-1 Invader ithumele idatha yendawo Emhlabeni eyasetshenziswa ekufakweni kobuciko nokudala umculo.
artsat.caption1: I-ARTSAT-1 Invader framework kanye nezingxenye ezisele ezisele eMhlabeni.
artsat.caption2: umsebenzi [SPACE x ART] − ngale kombukiso we-Cosmologies obuseMnyuziyamu ye-Contemporary Art Tokyo

kac.text: Iciko lesimanje lase-Brazil kanye laseMelika u-Eduardo Kac ufake isandla kwezobuciko basemkhathini ngokusebenzisana ne -NASA kanye ne-SpaceX . I-"Inner Telescope" yakhe ( i-2017 ), eyakhiwe nosonkanyezi waseFrance uThomas Pesquet , yaholela ekudwebeni okuqoshiwe okwenziwe ku- International Space Station .
kac.caption: I-Inner Telescope ku-International Space Station, edalwe nosonkanyezi waseFrance u-Thomas Pesquet, ngo-2017.

enoch.text: Ngo -2018 , i-CubeSat engenzi lutho eyakhiwe njengephrojekthi yobuciko yethulwa ku-orbit. Ithuthukiswe umculi womqondo we-bahamian u -Tavares Strachan , u-Enoch uqukethe imbiza ye-canopic ye-24-karat-gold ene-bust of the first African-American astronaut, Robert Henry Lawrence Jr.
enoch.caption: I-ENOCH (iyunithi yokubonisa), 2015-2017. ⓒ Tavares Strachan, isithombe ⓒ Museum Associates/LACMA.

orbitalReflector.text: Ngawo lowo nyaka, i-Orbital Reflector kaTrevor Paglen nayo yethulwa njengesifanekiso esigcinwe ku-CubeSat engasebenzi. Umsebenzi wawuyisenzo sobuciko esihloselwe ukushintsha indlela esiyibona ngayo indawo yethu emhlabeni. Akusetshenziswanga ngendlela efanele. Nakuba ingazange ivuleke ngendlela eklanywe ngayo, yavusa izingxoxo ezibalulekile futhi yathola izimpendulo ezivusa amadlingozi ezivela kosonkanyezi, ososayensi, abezindaba, othisha, abafundi, kanye nomphakathi jikelele emhlabeni wonke, okubonisa ukuthi ubuciko obuphumelelayo akudingeki buphumelele ngokobuchwepheshe.
orbitalReflector.caption: Ukunikezwa Kwedijithali kwe-Orbital Reflector, 2018

others.text: Abanye abaculi abaningi babambe iqhaza emkhakheni wezobuciko basemkhathini, ngalinye liletha imibono ehlukile ocwaningweni lwabo. Amaphrojekthi aphawulekayo ahlanganisa ucwaningo lweciko lika-Sarah Jane Pell likasomkhathi elihlola ukusebenza komuntu ezindaweni ezeqisayo; Iphrojekthi ka-Agnes Meyer-Brandis ye -Moon Goose Analogue ehlola ukulandisa komlando nesimanje kokuhlola indawo; Uhlelo lukaNahum lwe -AstroArts olusiza ukuhlolwa kwe-microgravity yobuciko; kanye nesithombe sika-Arthur Woods sika- Cosmic Dancer , isithombe esibaziwe sokuqala esavezwa emkhathini esiteshini saseMir ngo-1993.

orbitalTemple.text: Ngo- 2025 , ngemva kweminyaka engu-4 yocwaningo nentuthuko, umculi waseBrazil u-Edson Pavoni kanye neqembu labahlanganyeli bemikhakha eminingi bazokwethula i-Orbital Temple , isathelayithi yobuciko ebambe iqhaza emema noma ubani emhlabeni ukuthi athumele amagama ku-orbit, okwenza isikhumbuzo esihlanganisa kakhulu ngaphandle kwemingcele.
orbitalTemple.caption: Ithempeli le-Orbital eMercosul Bienal. Isithombe: Clara Marques

imageAlts.moonMuseumWarhol: Icwecwe le-ceramic le-Moon Museum elibonisa yonke imisebenzi yobuciko
imageAlts.artsatArt: Umsebenzi wobuciko udalwe kusuka kudatha ye-ARTSAT-1
